atk-abh03a63:1_1: Idāni kusalādīnaṁ padānaṁ paṭikkhepavasena dhammānaṁ paccanīyatāya laddhanāmaṁ paccanīyapaṭṭhānaṁ dassetuṁ
atk-abh03a63:1_2: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a63:1_3: Tattha nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiccāti kusalassa paccayabhāvaṁ vāreti.
atk-abh03a63:1_4: Nakusalo dhammo uppajjatīti kusalassa uppattiṁ vāreti,
atk-abh03a63:1_5: tasmā “akusalābyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca akusalābyākatā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā nayenettha pañhaṁ vissajjitabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a63:1_6: Tasmiṁ tasmiṁ paccaye laddhagaṇanā pana pāḷiyaṁ vuttāyeva.
atk-abh03a63:1_9: Tasmā sabbamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena pāḷiṁ upaparikkhitvā veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a63:7_2: Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṁ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti ekena pariyāyena catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṁ
